definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: watered;—ms. ´[[ר]]:, of garden [[גַּן]] (in sim.) Je 31:12, Is 58:11; fs. [[הָרָוׇה]] De 29:18 (opp. [[הַצְּמֵאָה]]; appar. of herbage, in proverb, expression for everything); perhaps also cstr. [[רְוֵה]] Job 10:15 = sated with afflication (for [[רְאֵה]]), v. [[[רָאֶה]]].
